title: Guy was super toxic and mistyped words saying it keeps him from getting banned?
body:
Is this true? Does it actually work like that? I reported the guy but I was curious. These are our chat logs. 

Toxic Guy :  LOL
Toxic Guy :  ur so sad bud
Enemy team :  that hold u back
Juggernaut John TPTG :  also whats the point in saying you're mistyping to avoid ban if you say that in the chat? 
Juggernaut John TPTG:  you're a walking oxymoron
Toxic Guy :  you dont know how the ban bot works
Toxic Guy :  its ok
Toxic Guy :  big brian
Toxic Guy :  =)

Sorry if I said anything wrong, was just coming here to ask if he'll actually avoid a ban this way? He was saying things like moron,idiot, and worse but mistyping them like calling me abd instead of bad. 
thanks for the help.

replies.body: Update, I think he just got punished because i got instant feedback right after posting this xD

I once saw someone screaming homophobic slurs in chat while running it down as hard as he could and ranting that he was teaching us a lesson. No ban. He put a space into the middle of the slurs. And 26 deaths in 18 minutes apparently is just a bad game.

Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't.

The main reason why is probably because that guy was on a streak of games without reports, and unfortunately one game isn't enough for someone who has honor 3+, which is exactly what smart trolls do, they're manipulative snakes, they get everyone to feed them with trust praise and honor, and then they use the power to exact chaos with moderation.

He's right. However, if your intent is _obvious_ and you end up getting manually reported. Then its not the bot but an actual PSS scanning your report. Which means that you can no longer evade the punishment. 

Also, even if they aren't manually ticketed. Once reports accumulate, someone is definitely going to have a look at what's going on. And if they get to see you evading ZT words or using racial slurs by misspelling words intentionally. Then its likely going to result in a punishment.

He’s not right. The bot is not some “word filter” and can see many “misspellings”.

The only exception is an escalated punishment for the n/f words which are hard coded.
"walking oxymoron.." Holy shit I like that a lot.

I'm guessing anything that Microsoft Word is smart enough to offer to correct, even Riot can afford to implement. 

The typo would have to be so scrambled that no one would even recognize it.

I too have seen people try to bypass the system, like removing a space between words. "YOU ARE A SMARTGUY" like that

I and probably other guys in my team have reported a guy who said the N word with spaces and 3 G, he still played 3-4 games after that... Though I got the IFS pop up today, which has not happened in a long {{champion:22}} time... TWICE in like 3 consecutive games in fact! I will check his history tomorrow. Meanwhile some guy used the K word a few days ago and I reported him yet he is still playing.

depends on how you write it.
i dare to say "kis" will not be interpreted as "kys"
while idk saying "youre super tump" instead of dumb will most likely not get you around a punishement
Misspellings do not bypass the system.
Riot Games has an amazing automated system. Fear not, with every report; the system feeds on...it gets stronger and smarter! He will be surely banned if his actions do merit it. Goodluck, summoner !
